text: Tell me everything you see happening in the nap picture. Everything that's going on there. Okay. Well in the first place, the mother forgot to turn off the water and the water's running out the sink. And she's standing there, thrown on the floor. The child has got a stool and reaching up into the cookie jar and the stool is tipping over and he's sort of put down the plates and she's reaching up to get it. but I
